name: Vanny
bio: Vanny is passionate about western Comicbooks but his art style is heavily inspired and driven by manga-style art with influences such as Sakamoto Shinichi, Ito Ogure and Tite Kubo. My artistic themes include Death, Aging, Lunacy, Curiosity and several dark-themed subjects

name: Bolu Sowoolu
bio: Bolu is a multidisciplinary artist passionate about evolving her art.

name: Khadijah
bio: Khadijah works in advertising. She played a huge role in defining the stories for The J Guide.

name: Jubril Olambiwonnu
bio: Jubril is an IOS Engineer and a super cool human. He contributed immensely to the pilot episode for The J Guide.

name: Eseosa Belo-Osagie
bio: Eseosa is a digital illustrator and product designer at Check DC.

name: Wale Oloworekende
bio: Wale is a freelance culture writer and critic operating from Lagos whose work explores the intersection of popular culture, music, film, sports culture, and youth lifestyle.

name: Daniel Orubo
bio: Daniel is the head of content at Piggyvest and Backdrop

name: Ire Aderinokun
bio: Ire is a front-end developer and user interface designer. She's the co-founder of Hellicarrier.

name: Ani Kayode
bio: Ani Kayode is an award-winning queer writer and liberation fighter marinated in anti-imperialist rage.

name: Edwin Okolo
bio: Edwin is a result-oriented writer, editor and strategic thinker focused on using his knowledge, experience and skill sets to enrich the lives of my target audience.

name: OluTimehin Kukoyi
bio: Timehin is a Nigerian writer, essayist and public intellectual. Her work concentrates on questions of gender, sexuality, urbanism and feminism.

name: Adeniyi Ademoroti
bio: Adeniyi is a writer and an editor at BellaNaija.com. His writing has been featured in Brittlepaper and Per Contra.

name: Olakunle Olugunro
bio: Olakunle is a full-time happening babe writing his way into clarity, growth and empathy.

name: Innocent Ilo
bio: Innocent is a Nigerian writer based in Lagos. They are the regional winner for Africa of the 2020 Commonwealth Short Story Prize for their short story ‘When a Woman Renounces Motherhood’.

name: Mariam Sule-Izuagbe
bio: Mariam is a multifaceted professional whose work centers on intersectional feminism, underrepresented minorities within society as well as the delicate intricacies of interpersonal communication dynamics.

name: Fareeda Abdulkareem
bio: Fareeda is a freelance writer. One of the foremost critics in her country she was selected for the critic’s academy at the 2020 International Film Festival Rotterdam

name: Ope Adedeji
bio: Ope is an experienced editor with a demonstrated history of working in online media and traditional publishing

name: Kunle Popoola
bio: Kunle is a writer.

name: Osione
bio: Osione is a brand designer. He developed a technology called SLIDE to help businesses and personalities build stronger, bolder identities. He is really passionate about helping companies craft profitable identities.

name: Niyi Okeowo
bio: Niyi is a multi-disciplinary designer. He is CDO at Garmspot, and he's currently building Astra, a network of cities in the metaverse where you can play nft games and buy digital fashion you can wear in real life.

name: Saratu Dan-Habu
bio: Saratu is experienced in legal matters relating to emerging and disruptive technology and specializes in all aspects of intellectual property law and practice, especially as it relates to searches, filings, registration, protection and enforcement.

name: Hannatu
bio: Hannatu is a legal practitioner.

name: Yadichinma
bio: Eris is a writer and storyboard artist. When she's not building with friends at wuruwuru, she's learning french and training her cat to understand sign language.

name: Samson
bio: Samson is an assistant producer at Kugali.

name: Ivierawo Lesso
bio: Ivie is a self-taught illustrator and 2D animator.

name: Yanmo Omorogbe
bio: Yanmo is a Co-Founder and Director of Growth at Bamboo. Before founding Bamboo, she was an Investment Associate at the African Infrastructure Investment Managers (AIIM)

name: LMBSKN
bio: LMBSKN is a sound producer.

name: Remy Baggins
bio: Remy is a is a Nigerian singer, songwriter, producer and sound engineer.

name: Chuks Emeibiam
bio: Chuks is the lead animator on the Hanky Panky Project.

name: Joshua Adeoye
bio: Joshua is a freelance animator, book illustrator and artist, currently working on 2 comic series and a secret project.

name: Kolade Morakinyo
bio: Kolade is the head of the sound department at Visus Sonic Arts.

name: Oshuwa Imoyo
bio: Oshuwa is an actress, known for The Wait (2021) and The Smart Money Woman.

name: Ifebusola Shotunde
bio: Ifebusola is a photographer and graphic designer who focuses on documenting the people and places on his life's journey

name: Jessica A.
bio: Jessica is a scriptwriter

name: Tosin Amire
bio: Tosin is an experienced audio post-production person (Film score Composition and sound designing) with a demonstrated history of working in the entertainment industry.
